name: iphone 13
dec: The iPhone 13 features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display for vibrant visuals.It runs on Apple’s powerful A15 Bionic chip, ensuring fast performance and efficiency.The dual-camera system offers excellent photo and video quality, including Cinematic mode.It supports 5G connectivity and has improved battery life over previous models.With a sleek design and available in multiple colors, it's a solid upgrade for most users.
